Allow/disallow bypassing of two-factor authentication for workspace participant

Source: R/bypass_2fa.R
participant_bypass_2fa.Rd

Note that this setting can only be updated by a workspace owner. More information on two-factor authentication can be found in vignette("two-factor").

Usage

participant_bypass_2fa(
  participant_uuid,
  allow_bypass = TRUE,
  use_proxy = FALSE
)

Arguments

participant_uuid

Participant UUID (note that this is different to the user UUID)

allow_bypass

Logical to indicate whether the participant should be able to bypass two-factor authentication for workspace.

use_proxy

Logical to indicate whether to use proxy
